if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "debug")
  add_definitions(-D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS)
  add_definitions(-D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
  add_definitions(-D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS)
  add_definitions(-D_DEBUG)
  set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}  -MMD -MP -MP -g -Wall -Wextra -fomit-frame-pointer -m64 -std=c++14 -fno-rtti -fno-exceptions")
  set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS}  -MMD -MP -MP -g -Wall -Wextra -fomit-frame-pointer -m64")
endif()

if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "release")
  add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
  set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}  -MMD -MP -MP -O3 -m64")
  set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS}  -MMD -MP -MP -O3 -m64")
endif()


if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "debug")
  add_library(riku.debug STATIC ${source_list})
endif()

if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "release")
  add_library(riku STATIC ${source_list})
endif()
